title: URBANopt Distribution Generator
description: Schema for an URBANopt RNM Distribution Generator object

GenP_kW.description: Peak active power kW. Used to model the network.

GenQ_kVAr.description: Peak reactive power in kVAr. Used to model the network.

Code.description: Unique name/ID of the feature in the RNM analysis.

Node.description: Name/ID of the RNM analysis feature it is associated with.

Subest.description: Substation the generator is connected to.

Feeder.description: Feeder the generator is connected to.
